creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and the Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation; purchase from the Thomas Murray Collection
description: indigo-dyed kimono; leaping fish coming out of swirling waves on the back; small, detailed, scaled spots of blue and white across background on back and continues over onto front side; cresting waves on bottom front side
markings: on inner PR opening, at bottom: Murray Collection label: JAP 6103
title: Festival kimono decorated with carp ascending a waterfall made in Akita Prefecture
